quest.name: You're a Gem
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
Davith is fretfully taking count of the Night's Blessed's store of gemstones.
objectives: Deliver the glittering gemstones to the traveling trader.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: Yes? Oh, my apologies. I'm expecting a delivery of goods from the Crystarium.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: That is where you are from, yes? If you should happen to see a merchant on the path there when next you return, please tell them we eagerly await their arrival.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: I do hope the merchant is all right.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: Davith of Slitherbough awaits my arrival? Oh dear, I am rather late, aren't I?

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: I would have arrived there bells ago, but my amaro was chased off the path by a treant.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: Before I could settle her down, half of my cargo had been sent tumbling into the lake.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: I've recovered everything save for a handful of gemstones that rolled beyond the shallows into the depths of the lake. It's so dreadfully deep, I could never hope to hold my breath long enough to dive down and retrieve them.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: You will? Truly? Bless you, misssir.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: There are five gemstones in total. Retrieve them and I will see to it you are handsomely rewarded.

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: Were you able to find them all?

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: Were you able to find them all?

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: By the blessed Dark, you've done it!

dialogue.name: TROUBLEDMERCHANT03449
dialogue.text: I better hurry to Slitherbough, then. I will leave your reward with Davith. Safe travels, friend.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: A merchant arrived not long ago with our delivery. As he told it, some brave traveler dove into the lake to retrieve several jewels for him, and I suspect I know who.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: I believe this is for you.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: You have done a great deed for the Night's Blessed. Perhaps greater than you realize.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: We call them heartstones. They are blessed by our priests and given to all at birth. We are never to part with them, from our first breath to our last.

dialogue.name: DAVITH
dialogue.text: Of course, heartstones are not all made of the same jewel. Parents are to choose from one of several to be presented to their children. Thanks to you, we now have an ample selection.
